data.message: Dont know if u will ever read this but i really want to meet you....just to talk to the real you...i can relate to nearly all your songs and it breaks my heart....im sorry If I sound like a crazy stalker fan but im not....i live in Austria (Europe) so im not even in the same country as you....again I just wanted to write something and let you know I think u are an awesome person....some of your songs have been risky...but you have still gone ahead and sung these songs!!  Respect
